name: tm02
effect: Teaches Dragon Claw to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Dragon Claw to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Headbutt Gen I: Razor Wind)

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user slashes the target with huge sharp claws.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user slashes the target with huge sharp claws.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.
